main event: An object was observed to fall in Camp Crook, Rapid City, S.D. on 28-29 July 1954, resembling a black aircraft with jet-like exhaust and causing explosions.
interesting points: Several explosions were reported, one in the air and one on the ground., The object traveled very fast, about the size of an aircraft., There were calls from airline dispatchers about unidentified flying objects in the area., Up to 100 objects were later reported over Rapid City., Pilots scrambled for identification thought the phenomena were possibly caused by a meteor shower.
sighted object: a black object resembling an aircraft
witness description: Mr. Mister (name redacted) saw the object fall 12 miles south of the city.
